transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, ji bolye Satyaveer ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan sir, haan sir, haan sir. Satyaveer ji se baat. Accha, Amrit baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Sab theek thaak, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Sir, ye hamari lead nahi aa rahi smoke gun ki, sabke paas mein barabar aa rahi hai.
Executive: Kaunsi kis keyword mein lead nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: A anti smoke gun, pollution anti smoke gun.
Executive: Ek minute aap call pe rehna.
Customer: Ye Nimesh ji aapke andar kaam karte hai ya fir aap Nimesh ji ko report karte ho sir?
Customer: Nimesh ji, Nimesh ji.
Executive: Nimesh.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Nimesh ji. Haan to to uske andar aap kaam karte ho, unke andar aap kaam karte ho ya fir haan aap unko hum karte hai. Wo bhi jaise wo karte hai aise job hum karte hai to unke number se login hai account bhi.
Executive: Accha accha ji. Meri baat hui thi unse iske regarding. Ek baar aap bata dena mere ko ek baar spelling se bata sakte ho sir main agar check kar raha hu yaha par. To ek baar bataana kaunse keyword mein aapko lead kam mil rahi hai?
Customer: A anti pollution gun. Anti smoke gun jo aati hai, smoke gun jo aati hai.
Executive: Haan haan, hamara main wahi hai.
Customer: Anti. Anti smoke gun. Ek minute aap call pe rehna, main dekh raha hu.
Executive: Aapke samne aapka seller panel login hai sir abhi?
Customer: One second.
Executive: Hello. Haan sir.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Aapke paas aapka seller panel login hai abhi aap open hai waha par?
Customer: Abhi main kar leta hu sir.
Executive: Login karna ek baar ko.
Customer: Sir main ruko.
Executive: Haan kiya sir?
Customer: Okay jab aap open karenge uske baad by lead wale section mein jaana aap sir.
Customer: Haan lead lead message mein aa gaya sir. My lead mein. By lead, by lead mein, by lead mein. Theek hai. Haan by lead mein. Jab aap by haan by lead mein aap jaoge to right side mein screen ke right side mein niche mein ek past lead karke bana hoga. Check karo sir past lead green colour se bana hoga.
Customer: A by lead mein.
Executive: Hello. By lead wale haan by lead wale section mein jab aap jaoge sir.
Executive: To right side mein right side mein niche mein past lead karke hoga ek past lead buyer profile balance help aisa likha hoga char aise icon bane honge.
Customer: One second dekh rahe hai.
Executive: Main aapko guide karta hu waha par. Ek baar by lead mein recent wale tab par jaana recent wale par.
Executive: Sabse upar jo aapko lead dikh rahi hai sabse upar jo lead dikh rahi hogi concrete mixer machine ki dikh rahi hogi.
Customer: Haan haan, Odisha haan haan.
Executive: Odisha Ganjam Odisha ki dikh rahi hai?
Customer: Haan. Waha par niche dikh raha hoga contact buyer now uske just bagal mein right hand side par buyer profile past lead balance and help karke char icon bane honge right side par uske just right side par.
Executive: Contact buyer now ke just right side par screen ke right side mein bottom mein.
Customer: Contact. Head. Past past lead buyer profile balance help green colour se.
Customer: Past lead dikhai nahi de raha. Dikha? Past lead. Nahi main dekh raha hu sir.
Executive: Past lead.
Customer: A nahi hai mere mein to.
Executive: Aap system pro mein aapko ek baar video meet ka link share karu aap video meet join kar sakte ho abhi. Main aapko. Mobile mein mobile mein login rakhe hai humne.
Executive: Mobile par aap mobile se hi join kar lo.
Customer: Haan haan mobile se. Main main haan main mobile se hi join kar lo. Mobile par main jo aapka link hai isme registered mail main us par link share kar raha hu. Aapko waha par dikh jayega ek minute.
Customer: Nahi wo actually unki shadi hai wo usko nahi kar payenge registered mail mein. Unhi ke paas mein login hai wo.
Executive: Accha to to aapka koi mail hoga mail ka wo bata do main us par share kar deta hu.
Customer: Main isi mein aap isi mein bataiye mujhe.
Executive: To aap jab by lead wale page par jayenge waha past lead ka ek option dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Nahi dikh raha hai to let me guide you.
Executive: Waha past lead ka option dikhta hai.
Customer: Past lead. Past lead main check kar raha hu.
Customer: Past aa raha khali past.
Executive: Past nahi PST past lead.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Aa raha hai us par click kijiye. Us par click kijiye.
Customer: Kar diya kar diya.
Executive: Ab usse jab aap click karoge ek cheez notice karna sir usme aapko anti smoke gun monkey hoist machine uske baad aur bhi jo usme upar search karne ka option aayega waha aap search karna anti smoke gun. Usme search karo anti smoke gun.
Customer: Aa gaya. To haan ye leads aayi hai but ye sold out ho gayi kyuki aap isko purchase nahi kar paye ho. Kya hota hai ek jo lead aati hai wo panch buyer hi purchase karte hai aur uske baad wo sold out ho jati hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To aap isko purchase nahi kar paye us beech mein ye sold out ho gayi. Abhi kya iski leads aati hai lekin jo aapka aapko mostly mostly jo aapko lead dikhti hogi wo dikhti hogi aapko monkey hoist machine ki ya sand screening machine ki drum mixer ki ye sab ki lead aapko kafi jyada dikhti hogi mere hisab se jo main yaha par data check kar pa raha hu. Right?
Customer: Haan. Sand screening machine monkey hoist machine inki leads aapko kafi jyada dikhti hogi concrete mixer cement mixer inki lead aapko kafi jyada dikhti hogi. Comparatively anti smoke gun ki leads aapko kam dikhti hogi right?
Customer: Yes yes yes.
Executive: Ye isliye hota hai ki jo IndiaMART ka hum machine learning ya AI jo hai usko is tar wo is tarike se kaam karta hai. Jaise for example youtube par aap jate hai youtube par kuch aise videos aap dekhte hai waise videos aapko aane lag jate hai right? To IndiaMART mein abhi tak aapka kya pattern chal raha tha ki aap sand screening machine concrete mixer cement mixer aur ye reverse drum mixer monkey hoist machine in sab ki lead aap kafi jyada pick karte the. To us wajah se uski leads aapko kafi jyada dikhti hai aapko ye anti smoke gun ki jo leads hai ye aapko kam dikhti hai. Theek hai? Meri baat hui thi haan boliye.
Customer: Ab iske liye kya karna padega hume?
Executive: Main bata de raha hu. Meri baat hui thi abhi Nimesh ji se aapka ek aur company chal raha hai cap mix karke cap mix machine bhi aap jante honge. Right?
Customer: Haan to cap mix chal raha hai to unhone mujhe bataya tha ki aapka machinery machinery ka jyada kaam hai isliye ye lead jyada consume hota hai. Ab iske liye aapko solution ye hai ki abhi aapko past lead mein waha par waha par anti smoke gun ki jo bhi lead dikh rahi hai sab mein I am interested karke likha hua aa raha hoga. Anti smoke gun search karke jitne bhi leads aapko dikh rahe hai us par I am interested kar dijiye aur lead search karke jo by lead ka by lead wale section mein aap jaoge waha par lead search karke anti smoke gun uski jaise aap do teen din lead consume karoge automatically anti smoke gun ki ka jo preference hai wo aapka note ho jayega aur anti smoke gun ki jaise leads aayegi wo aapko sabse upar mein top par dikhne lag jayegi sir. Is tarike se hoga. Same haan same youtube aur insta wala pattern jaise videos dekhoge waise videos aate hai waise same pattern iska bhi hai. Jaise haan bolo sir.
Customer: Accha jaise sab pe I am interested main kar deta hu sabko hai na?
Executive: Haan anti smoke gun wale par karna kisi aur par abhi mat karo aapko anti smoke gun ki chahiye to anti smoke gun wale par karo abhi. Jitne bhi aapko dikh rahe hai haan usme to usse ek aapka pattern ban jayega Satyaveer ji fir kya rahega ki aapko usi tarike ki leads aani chalu ho jayengi back to back fir waise hi leads aayengi aapka ek pattern note ho jayega. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir thank you. Aur haan aur abhi kya karna hai ye to aapne past lead mein kar diya abhi filhal ke liye aapko kya karna hai ki by lead wale section mein jaana hai aur upar search karne ka jo option aata hai waha search karke anti smoke gun ki do char lead aise aap khud se search karke consume kar lijiye. Abhi dikh rahi hai to theek hai nahi to kuch der ke baad fir raat mein bhi ek baar search kar lijiyega aur do teen lead jaise aap purchase karenge do din continue automatically iski leads aapko upar dikhne lag jayegi pehle dikhne lag jayegi aate se aur jo baki ke jo keywords hai uski leads aapko dheere dheere wo niche chali jayengi aur ye upar aa jayega promote ho kar is tarike se wo pattern kaam karta hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay okay okay. Okay. Iske alawa bhi aur koi pareshani hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi sir bas yahi hai bas smoke gun hamare liye important hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul meri baat hui thi iske regarding to ek baar ek baar mere ko ye bataana sir abhi mere ko service ke regarding baat karni rahegi to main Nimesh ji ko call karunga ya aapko call karunga?
Customer: Aap kisi ko bhi kar sakte hai koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Accha accha unhone bataya tha ki abhi wo sirf akele dekh rahe the wo koi employee hire karne wale the to abhi wo hire nahi kar paye the aisa kuch tha. Abhi koi problem ye ho rahi na.
Executive: Accha accha.
Executive: Theek hai to fir aapka number main save kar leta hu abhi se mere ko connect karna rahega to main Nimesh ji ya fir aapko connect kar lunga theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir okay.
Executive: Okay. Aur haan Satyaveer ji is call ke baad aapko mail par ek mail jayega hamare IndiaMART IndiaMART ki taraf se satisfactory mail ki aap jo problem aapko face ho raha tha uska solution mila ya nahi mila aur jo solution usse aap satisfied hai ya nahi hai to us par aap satisfied mark kar dena ya jo aapka feedback hai wo mark kar dena theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay sir thank you thank you thank you. Okay thank you.
Executive: Okay okay sir aur kuch bhi problem rahega mera call kar lena number save kar lo mera ye mera number nahi hai aap main number main bata de raha hu personal number wo aap usme call kar lena ye ye number bhi save kar sakte ho number ek baar note karna mera. Ya aisa karo sir ye aapka whatsapp number hai 9 9457104236?
Customer: Haan ye mera whatsapp number hai.
Executive: Haan main aapko is par message kar de raha hu aap mera number save kar lena theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir thank you thank you.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting buyleads for smoke gun.

- Wants to know whom to contact for service.



Resolution:

- Executive provided steps to get smoke gun buyleads.

- Executive said customer can contact anyone for service.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share his number on WhatsApp.

- Customer will mark satisfaction on the feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, smoke gun, subscription, service
